name: Jordan C
text: Absolutely terrible. Only part of my order was delivered, and the delivery guy said he would run back for my missing drinks and food. I live less than a mile from the store, but 30 minutes later I drove to the store to see what was going ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza Hut. I always like it

name: Emily Ames
text: Absolutley awful.  No sauce on the pizza.  The sauce is what makes the pizza.  Had to throw the thin crust away.  Will not order from them again.  Dominoes is much better .

name: Danny Calvert
text: We got a real good pizza. An they are nice an friendly.

name: Linda Price
text: Idk why bad reviews. First pizza since pandemic - it's was perfect and delicious! Classic Pizza Hut!!.   Had double cheese, pepperoni and pan crust.

name: Bryce Williams
text: Drove through and picked up our pizza. It was hot and fresh and the gentleman at the window was very nice. The pizza itself wasn't cut very well but we had a cutter at home to take care  of that.

name: Roxanne Tesar
text: Drive up service was SLOW. Food was good.

name: Sharon Brown
text: Got there and they said it just had to be cut.   Supposed to be curbside contactless.   Waited 20 minutes for them to cut it and stopped a delivery guy.    He checked on it and brought it to us.   Dry, no sauce, worst pizza ever.   Won‚Äôt be going again.

text: Took 25 mins longer than we were told. Pizza wasn't even hot by the time they got it through the window to me.

name: David Bates
text: I would have given zero stars because of the order being wrong when delivered and having to wait almost 3 hours for it to be fixed. The manager personally delivered our new order and she was great. Jessica definitely went above and beyond ‚Ä¶More

text: I placed an order of wings and fries to be delivered to my work that is literally less than minute away. I called and placed this order at 11:15 am. I get one hour for lunch.....it is 12:46 pm and the food is still not here. Let me say that ‚Ä¶More

text: My family and I had ordered a lg pepperoni with bacon pizza with a side of breadsticks and it was seriously the best pizza we have had in a long time. It was fast it was hot it was delicious and it was cooked perfectly. The customer service ‚Ä¶More

text: Jenna was amazing at providing exceptional service even though it was busy and short staffed. It s refreshing to see such. She was same great way to everyone that was there and the ones that came in. I would recommend the owners to do what ‚Ä¶More

name: Roger Deason
text: Good pizza and a nice salad bar...

name: Dustin Miles
text: Paid $18 for one large pan pepperoni pizza. Seriously?! Not worth it! The taste was equivalent to the stuff they serve for school lunch. Save your money and go buy a couple Market Fresh pizzas from Walmart. Shoot, even a frozen Jack's pizza would be better than this monstrosity.  Pizza Hut...never again.

name: Mary Samples
text: Was 1 of my favorite restaurant until their prices went up. Under new management.

text: Very friendly staff and the pizza is the best around.

text:
Worked at the place for 8 year then was let go by new owners after 2 years with them for reasons that were unfounded.
Heard it has gone down hill since I was let go

name: juan mendoza
text: Got a darn good pizza tonight, good timely delivery and delivery guy definitely knocked hard like we asked üòÇüòÇüòÇ but anyways our kids were all about it tonight thank you Marion pizza hut we are definitely happy

name: Zane Withers
text: Good food with okay service. If this place is busy service tends to lack quite a bit. If there are only a couple tables filled it's usually good. Definitely recommend getting the pan pizza.

name: Timothy Wheaton
text: I have no idea what they have done to their sauce but might as well put ketchup on the crust. Sweet with no tang or kick. Service is terrible breadsticks tough and over cooked. Find pizza elsewhere. Not as good as it once was and not even worth trying once.

name: jro w
text: Brenda was the server.  We picked up a large meat lovers stuffed crust and cheesy bread sticks.  It was cooked to golden cheesy perfection. Best pizza I have had including waltz's dry ass crust.

name: Soul Chain
text: Went to apply for the job and everything was fine with the process before I submitted my employment paperwork in person and I got funny looks ever since. Now they're giving me the run around and saying they're not hiring when they still have the sign up.

name: matt hartman
text: Place is a joke they forget something or bring the wrong food every time and it takes forever when I asked why when I asked why they said its because they are way understaffed because the new owners are greedy and dont want to pay people to be there

name: Melanie Friese
text: Smells like old grease when walked in. Friendly staff. Not many people there.  Over priced.

name: Shelly Vincelette
text:
Easily seen from the highway but parking area is dark and off a side street.
The salad bar is sad. Just the basics.
The food over all was good and the wait staff friendly.

name: Captain Swisher
text: Food was good and there was only two people working. A delivery driver that was in and out and one lady rocking out everything. Will come here again next time thru. The tap water in this area taste dirty.
